name: Adonis the Cozener
effect:
Deverenian Warlord • Illusionist • Duke Tremayne
Your Deverenians have the ability "React: Once per turn, after this Deverenian is targeted by a melee or ranged strike, the acting character must succeed with a Perception check (DC 12) or the strike is Critical Failure and Adonis gains +2 Skill."

name: Aid
effect:
Dwarves do not spend to perform this action.
Spend Order: Remove a wound from a target character. If this character is Free Kingdoms, the target gets +3 ATK and +3 AC until end of turn.
"The dragons have fled the skies, but cast long shadows. Give the people hope."

name: Albino Novice
effect:
NoThRoG
React: Before Albino Novice dies: Your next melee or ranged strike is a Critical Success.
"They're so fragile. It's a wonder any of them survive long enough to get our attention." - Mudan

name: Alestair the Attentive
effect:
Deverenian
While Alestair has 10 or greater Skill, he has +2 levels for casting spells. and any time he inflicts wounds with a spell he inflicts an additional wound.
"Why would Modred cast a Stormwraith out of the Storm?" Slayer glared at his pupil. "I-I will scour the text for answers."

name: Alholland Bramble
effect:
Weapon
Order: Discard a card and spend Alholland Bramble: Target each character in an adjacent rank. Each target must succeed with a Dexterity save (DC 10 + this fighter's ATK) or suffer a wound.
Order: Discard two cards: Return Alholland Bramble to your hand from play.

name: Amon Dythanus
effect:
Elf • Necromancer
While Amon has 6 or greater Skill, he has +1 Level.
Spend React: Before a character of equal or lower level performs a melee or ranged strike, Kill Amon: The strike is a Critical Failure.

name: Argus Gawk
effect:
Mercenary • Seer
Spend Order: Choose an opponent: That player reveals a card from his hand, Argus Hawk performs a ranged strike with a bonus equal to the level of the revealed card.
"You took my eyes, demon! I return favor!"

name: Arla Favorsight
effect:
Dwarf
Spend Order: Target Dwarf gains a bonus to his ATK equal to his AC -10, until the end of turn.

name: ArLorr
effect:
NoThRoG • VoTaurr
Spend Order: Target two NoThRoG in your army of different level and choose an opponent. That opponent chooses one of those two NoThRoG. The chosen NoThRoG is stunned, the other is moved to your first rank.

name: Aspare
effect:
Familiar • Unique
Mercenary only. +4 Skill.
Spend Order: Once per turn, target a number of lower level Mercenaries up to the number of wounds on this character: Ready the targets.
"A drowned warrior woman of the past will be your guide." - Light

name: Awake to Nature
effect:
Spend Order: Stun all items in play. If this character is a
Druid, items do not unstun during the next ready phase.
"I have sought your counsel for so long, Miracus. Just grant me a moment of your time." - Leun Moonstone

name: Awaken Curse
effect: Spend Order: Target a character within two ranks, who may discard any number of items: The target must succeed with a Magic save (DC 10 + highest level equipped item) or suffer two wounds.
"All Ablung's weapons are cursed, Sir Lucian. Avenger has chosen you, and you cannot escape it." - Terak Justicebringer

name: Baeddan
effect:
Mercenary • Druid • Oozemaster
React: Once per turn, after a target character rolls a Critical Failure: Stun the target.
The abyssals scrambled to the surface, only to find their loyal cultists waiting...

name: Beg Forgiveness
effect: React: After a target character rolls a Critical Failure: Stun the target.
"The Tremayne half-breed escaped thee into the Storm?" Creigh smiled kindly. "Then follow him."

name: Beia Tansiq
effect:
Elf
Beia has +3 ATK when performing melee strikes against Evil characters.
React: After targeting a Good character with a melee strike, inflict one wound on Beia: The strike is a Critical Success.
"Heroes sacrifice themselves, and where's the fun in that?"

name: Betray Fate
effect: React: After a target character enters play: Inflict a wound on the target. Choose an opposing player who draws a card.
"The three moons' alignment doth blind gods and fates alike, your majesty. You mayest act without fear of Signon's prophecies." - Kassia the Saint

name: Black Shuck
effect:
Familiar • Unique
Elf only. +2 Skill.
React: After this Elf targets a melee or ranged strike, cancel the strike and discard a card: Succeed with a Skill check (DC = target's AC) to inflict a wound on the target.

name: Blacksand Trap
effect:
Trap
React: After a character in this rank is targeted by a melee strike, spend and stun Blacksand Trap: The acting character must succeed with a Dexterity save (DC 15, DC 20 if this character is a Dwarf) or suffer a wound and become stunned.

name: Blacksnake Whip
effect:
Weapon
If this character is a NoThRoG, Blacksnake Whip loses the
Weapon trait.
All characters in your army have the ability "Order: Spend an equipped Steed: Perform a +0 melee strike." Deverenians get a bonus to the strike equal to the level of the spent Steed.

name: Blind the Gods
effect:
React: After you roll Initiative: All players place the cards in their hands on top of their decks in any order. Until the end of the turn,
Warlords have the ability "Order: Once per turn: All players draw 3 cards."
"On days such as this, my champion, mortals form their own destinies." - Dallen Stormlost

name: Boil Blood
effect:
Characters of level 6 or higher do not spend to perform this action.
Spend Order: Target character within 2 ranks must succeed with three consecutive Magic saves (DC 5 + caster's Skill) or suffer a wound for each failed save.

name: Brack Fiend
effect:
Mercenary • Monster
May not equip items.
React: After an opposing character rolls a Critical Failure: Perform a melee strike.
The creature took another piece of demon flesh and chewed it, glaring at Simon balefully.

name: Bribe
effect: Order: Put a character into play from your hand, ignoring loyalty penalties. If your Warlord is a Mercenary, reduce the target's entering rank by one, and it may cause an illegal formation if there is already at least one character in the rank.
"Welcome to the winning side, 'hero'." - Talespinner

name: Brin, Pillar of Kor
effect:
Dwarf • Druid
Spend React: After a target character rolls a Critical Success: Ready the target.
…while all fought with near-unending strength…

name: Brother Averill
effect:
Free Kingdoms
React: Before a Free Kingdoms in your army performs an Attack: His next two melee strikes this turn are Critical Failures. His next strike after those this turn is a Critical Success.
Some men are heroes for their valor. Others, because they always buy a round.

name: Caedmon Yscar
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Lycanthrope
After Caedmon enters play, roll a die and apply the following bonuses to Caedmon permanently: 1-5, +3 AC and +1 Hit Point; 6-10, +6 ATK and +4 AC; 11-15, +5 ATK, AC and Skill; 16-20, two additional strikes (Base +5).

name: Caran Tremayne
effect:
Deverenian • Illusionist
React: Once per turn, after a Deverenian in your army is targeted by an action or melee strike: Redirect the strike to an adjacent character of lower level than the target.
"The duchess is no more, milord, but her brother yet lives."

name: Cardinal Durand
effect:
Deverenian • Seer
Spend Order: Until end of the turn, all melee strikes are Critical Failures, if the target has a higher level than the ATK of the strike, and is not a
Warlord.
"Scelus hath betrayed us to Stormlost, and the Hierophant is mad. The Cardinals must find a new voice."

name: Cartwright Agent
effect:
Familiar • Unique
Free Kingdoms only.
This character has an additional melee strike (Base +0) when attacking. Other Free Kingdoms in this rank have +2 ATK, AC and Skill.
"Ssh. Don't look up, and don't react. It's a trap."

name: Cast Asunder
effect:
Spend Order: Spend X characters in your army, and target an opposing
Warlord: The target's controller must then spend X characters in his army.
"Kneel, Navdai. Your queen is here." - Slovien

name: Celestine
effect:
Mercenary
Order: Once per turn: Gain the
Seer,
Druid or
Cantor trait, permanently.

name: Claim the Soul
effect: Spend Order: Target a character within two ranks who must succeed a Magic save (DC 5 + caster's Skill, +5 for Elves) or permanently lose one Hit Point. If this kills the target, remove it from the game.
"How pathetic - a dwarf in the seat of Ichaerus' power." - Tepheroth

name: Command Horror
effect: Spend Order: Target all characters in an opposing first rank. Each target has -5 ATK and -5 AC. If this character is not a Deverenian, each target may perform a Magic save (DC 17) to suffer -3 ATK and -3 AC instead.
"Stand aside, beggars. I must have words with our Emperor." - Dallen Stormlost

name: Contest Thy Title
effect: Spend Order: Choose an opposing player who targets a character he controls. This character and the opposing character both roll a die and add their ATK to the roll (Deverenians add +5). The character that wins permanently gains +3 ATK, +3 AC, +1 Hit Point, and is readied.

name: Coreos Bodach
effect:
Elf Warlord • Necromancer • Undead • Ethereal
Order: Once per turn, kill an
Undead in your army: Your next melee strike is a Critical Success.
Some children told of Cordeos, and dreamed of terrors at night. Now, the dream walks the street od dead Corinth…

name: Corinth Ward
effect: Spend React: Before a character suffers wounds from a character with lower Skill than this cleric: Reduce the wounds by one.
"We found these hanging in the trees around Corinth." - Warren Brood

name: Corinth's Refuse
effect:
Elf • Undead
Whenever you would draw a card, you may instead return Corinth's Refuse from your discard pile to your hand.
React: Before Corinth's Refuse dies: Target character has -2 skill until end of turn.

name: Corrupt Chance
effect: Order: Until end of turn, whenever this character forces another character to make a Magic save, they roll two dice instead of one. You get to choose which die is kept. This character may perform another Order after this one.
"Come Elaneor. Let me purge thy Order of thy shameful blood..." - Adonis the Cozener

name: Crimson Rigel
effect:
Elf
React: After a character dies: Put a charge token on Crimson Rigel.
Spend Order: Remove 4 charge tokes from Crimson Rigel: Your next die roll is a Critical Success.
"Died in vain? Nonsense. Let me show you…"

name: Cry Havoc!
effect: Spend Order: Perform a melee strike against each opposing character in an adjacent rank.
"Our barbarians demand their leaders earn their titles," Ar'tek grinned, "and dethrone the unworthy."

name: Cyldragen's Token
effect:
May only be equipped to characters with 20 or greater AC.
Spend Order: Discard Cyldragen's Token, and choose a player: That player must stun a number of unstunned characters he controls with combined level equal to or greater than this character's Level.

name: Darkhart's Tears
effect:
Nothrogs may equip Darkhart's Tears regardless of class.
React: Before performing a melee strike, spend Darkhart's Tears: After the strike, if the strike hit, the target must succeed with a Poison save (DC 15, 19 if this character is an
Assassin) or all numerals on the target are reduced by one permanently.

name: Decapitate
effect: React: After this fighter rolls a Critical Success: Ready this fighter.
"Do thy worst, thou disgusting, maggoty, cowa-"

name: Deidra Price
effect:
Mercenary
React: Once per turn, after a character rolls a Critical Success or Failure: The roll is no longer considered a Critical Success or Failure.
"Not really sure which is which, and I found them! Keep on your toes, Varson, and try not to stare."

name: Deny
effect: React: After this character is targeted by an action card: The acting character must succeed with a Magic save (DC 15, two Magic saves if this character is a Deverenian) or the action is cancelled and placed on top of its owner's deck.
"...of course, the alliance with the Dwarves lasts only so long as the Dwarves remain below." - Lady Gracia Ghenis

name: Destiny's Hand
effect:
Gauntlet
React: Once per game, after an opponent rolls a Critical Failure: Destiny's Hand permanently gains +3 ATK, +3 AC, and
Riposte +5.
"Today, we are not peasants. We are heroes." - Kun Vian

name: Divine Will
effect:
React: After a player passes, spend Divine Will: That player must reveal his hand. If this character is a
Seer, discard one of the revealed cards.
"We are Deverenia. Boundless, friendless, merciless. Kneel to us and live, or die where you stand." - The Eternal Emperor

name: Drea Nexus
effect:
Dwarf • Cantor
While you have one or more spent or stunned Drea Nexus in your army, your Dwarves inflict an additional wounds with melee strikes, if the strike hits by 5 or more, or is a Critical Success.
…as clerics prayed…

name: Dunkirk Guide
effect:
Dwarf • Seer
React: Once per turn, after a Dwarf you control hits with a melee or ranged strike: the strike is a Critical Success.
That battle, all strikes found their mark…

name: Dupe
effect: React: After this character is targeted by a melee strike, move to a different position in this rank: The strike is a Critical Failure and the acting character must succeed with a Dexterity wave (DC 8 + this character's Skill) or be unable to perform additional melee strikes this turn.

name: Dythanus Mantle
effect:
Unique
Cleric and
Wizard only.
Order: Spend the Dythanus Mantle, and remove a character in your hand from the game: Put a target character of equal or lower level then the removed character into play from your discard pile. If that character is an Elf, he may perform an Order after this one.

name: Fer-Lith
effect:
Mercenary • Monster • Astral • Abyssal
React: Once per turn, after an opposing character rolls a Critical Success: That character's next die roll this turn is a Critical Failure.
A look of horror, the Abyssal Lord realized what was done. The Abyss… sealed.

name: Fineltour's Brooch
effect:
Dwarves, Free Kingdoms, and Mercanaries with Fineltour's Brooch equipped have +3 Skill.
React: After one of your characters rolls a save, spend Fineltour's Brooch: Add +5 to the roll.
"It's a gift. No strings attached." - Tavis Jape

name: Fineltour's Reeds
effect:
Unique
May only be equipped by a character with 20 or greater AC and 10 or greater ATK.
Spend Order: Choose another player and discard Fineltour's Reeds: The chosen player discards two cards. If they cannot, you draw two cards instead.

name: Finola Calix
effect:
Elf • Necromancer
React: After an action in which Finola killed a character: Finola gains +2 levels until end of turn.
"Killing Ichaerus is a simple task, but like any god elf lord, ho does not stay dead.:

name: Fortitude
effect:
Dwarf • Barbarian
React: After an action in which Fortitude is wounded: Ready Fortitude.

name: Fortune Lost
effect:
Deverenians, Elves, and NoThRoG with Fortune Lost equipped have +3 Skill.
React: After an opposing character rolls a save, spend Fortune Lost: Subtract 3 from the roll.
"Alas, Elaneor. All are so harsh to thee?" - Adonis the Cozener

name: Frostbite Wand
effect: Spend React: After another of your characters in this rank inflicts wounds on a target character with lower Skill than this character with an action (not a melee strike): Inflict a wound on the target.
"This isn't over." - Ichaerus

name: Fulfill Destiny
effect: React: Before a character suffers wounds: Reduce the wounds to zero. Choose an opposing player who draws a card.
"We abandoned Duncan, Kor, but he never abandoned us. He was a true hero." - Atone

name: Ganek
effect:
NoThRoG • Scout
May not maneuver.
React: After an opposing player rolls a Critical Failure: Ganek's ranged strikes may target an additional rank away until end of turn.
Spend Order: Perform two +4 ranged strikes.
"Sulak, something's brewing in the east. Something big."

name: Gant Foundation
effect:
Dwarf • Medicine +4
Spend Order: Succeed with a Medicine check (DC 20) to ready an adjacent unstunned Dwarf.
…raising each other up…

name: Garak Mirhault
effect:
NoThRoG • Stealth +0
After Initiative each turn choose an opposing player. You each reveal a card from hand simultaneously. If the other player's card is higher level he gains control of Garak.
"We keep him in chains until it's time to summon him, and never leave him out long. If Fasolt's this dangerous, we should just run." - Hechun

name: Gawk's Trinket
effect: Order: Discard Gawk's Trinket: The next level 1 spell this character casts this turn does not require spending as cost.
"I don't care if I can't use it. They were mine to start with!"

name: Ghed Carel
effect:
Deverenian • Stormwraith • Astral
React: After a melee or ranged strike targets Ghed Carel: The acting character must succeed with a Fear save (DC 9) or the strike is a Citical Failure.

name: Ghed Daucet
effect:
Deverenian • Stormwraith • Astral
React: Once per turn, after a target character within one rank attacks: If that character's ATK is lower than Daucet's level, stun the target.
The Storm knoweth an thou turn 'gainst it.

name: Ghed Morak
effect:
Deverenian • Stormwraith • Seer • Astral
Unique
React: After you roll Initiative, name an action card: If your
Warlord is a Deverenian, copies of that card may not be played until end of the turn.
Those who defy fate, invite it. Thinkest thou different, O Emperor?

name: Ghed Parcifal
effect:
Mercenary • Stormwraith • Astral
React: Once per turn, after a melee strike targets an adjacent character: The target gains an AC bonus equal to Ghed Parcifal's skill for the strike.
"Where is Lothian? Where?!" - Lord Gahid Rellion

name: Glenn the Blaze
effect:
Free Kingdoms
Spend Order: Perform a +0 ranged strike.
React: Once per turn, after Glenn performs a ranged strike that wounded its target: Perform a +0 ranged strike.
"Quickly, an it pleaseth thee, milord Terak."

name: Grudurk
effect: NoThRoG
"You and me, we're gonna play us a game. I'll ask a quesion, and every time I don't like the answer, I take a finger. Ready? Good. Where's Taoth?"

name: Gunnar Yscar
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Barbarian • Lycanthrope
While Gunnar has 1 or more wounds, he has +5 ATK, +5 AC, an additional strike (Base +0) and adjacent Free Kingdoms have +2 ATK.

name: Hat of Fire
effect:
Helm
+3 Skill
If this character has 16 or greater AC, Hat of Fire loses the
Helm trait.
"...well, I suppose not all of the Kabal's trinkets can be practical." - Syvonne Ashenstorm

name: Havalt Trotter
effect:
Dwarf
Spend Order: Target a character within one rank with lower ATK than Havalt: Move the target backward one rank.

name: Headsman Brock
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Defend +5 • Unique
Spend Order: Perform a number of +0 ranged or melee strikes equal to half Brock's Skill, rounded down. These strikes may not gain bonuses to the roll.

name: Hero's Blade
effect:
Weapon
React: Once per game, after this character rolls a Critical Success: Rusted Blade permanently gains +6 ATK and the text "This character's melee strikes are a Critical Success on a 15 or greater."
"The moons have undone fate. It is no curse to choose our own destinies, friends." - Kun Vian

name: Hide in Shadows
effect:
React: After this character is targeted by a melee or ranged strike: Succeed with a Stealth check (DC15) to cancel the strike.
Order: Gain
Stealth +5 until end of turn.
"Going somewhere, Hagen?" - Krun

name: ImSana
effect:
NoThRoG • VoTaurr
Spend Order: Kill one of your NoThRoG within two ranks, and target a character: Move to the NoThRoG's position, and the target is considered two additional characters for determining illegal ranks until end of turn.

name: Invoke Doom
effect:
Deverenian
Warlords play this action without spending.
Spend React: After a player rolls a die that was not preset. That player's next die roll is considered to be the same as this one.
"Terak has gone to face Rhawn a final time. May our fates be kinder." - Sir Lucian

name: Jada Latham
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Riposte +0
Jada does not spend or stun when she falls forward.
React: After Jada falls forward, she gains +3 AC until end of turn.
"What, Spencer, you think you'll be any less dead than the bluebloods?"

name: Julien
effect:
Deverenian • Riding +4
React: After Julien enters play: Equip a
Steed of level 6 or less from your discard pile to a Deverenian.
"Careful, boy. They have a mean temper, and like to kick. Tell me... what is your name?" - Terak Justicebringer

name: Kaballite Charm
effect:
Unique
React: Once per turn, after a target lower level character falls forward: Move the target backwards one ranks. Mercenaries have +1 level for performing this action.
"Enough nonsense. I will speak to your queen." - Zartoch

name: Kaelin
effect:
Elf
React: Once per turn, after an Elf in your army hits with a ranged strike: The strike is a Critical Success.

name: Kass-Kel
effect:
Mercenary • Seer • Sutek
React: Once per turn, before a die roll: The die roll has a penalty equal to Kass-Kel's Skill.
"Master Simon! The brine fiends have found something!"

name: Keir Tansiq
effect:
Elf
React: After a character within one rank rolls a Critical Failure on a melee or ranged strike, kill Keir: Inflict one wound on the target.
"The queen has triumphed. No witnesses." - Bronwen Tansiq

name: Kenton Rellion
effect:
Deverenian
React: Once per turn, after a character within 2 ranks rolls a Critical Failure on a melee or ranged strike: Perform a melee strike targeting that character.
"If thou art the Emperor's Champion, then show me the symbol of thy power! Only then shalt thou pass."

name: Keres
effect:
Elf • Undead • Unique
React: After a character rolls a Critical Success or Failure: Shuffle a character from any discard pile into its owner's deck.
"You saw a ghoul. Just a ghoul." - Krait

name: Keziah's Orb
effect:
Keziah's Orb may only be equipped to a character with 15 or greater Skill.
Order: Discard Keziah's Orb and choose another player: That player must discard two items they control in play.
"Thank you, Sali," Keziah whispered. "We know what to do now."

name: Kiandra the Utile
effect:
Deverenian • Illusionist
React: After Kiandra targets, or is targeted by, a melee strike or action, target an opposing character within two ranks of level 3 or less: She has the target's ATK, AC or Skill for the duration of the strike or action.

name: Kish
effect:
NoThRoG • Scout
Kish's ranged strikes are Critical Successes on a die roll of 16 or greater.
Spend Order: Perform a +2 Ranged strike. If the strike is a Critical Success, Kish may move forward one rank.

name: Kyne
effect:
Familiar • Medicine +5 • Powerattack +5 • Unique
Dwarf only.
Spend Order: Each of your Dwarves has a bonus to AC equal to his Hit Points until the end of turn.
"Wouldn't be so bad, if he didn't whistle the whole time." - Grim

name: Kyra Squib
effect:
Elf • Undead
React: After any player rolls a Critical Success or Failure, remove a card in your discard pile from the game: Put Kira into play spent from your discard pile.
"Guess I don't know when to give up, manling."

name: Lady Helene
effect:
Deverenian • Paladin
While Helene has +5 or greater ATK, she has an additional melee strike (Base +0) and +4 AC.
"The Black Sun draweth nigh, e'en as the very earth shakes with terror before it. All hail Signon, and all glory to his Eternal Emperor."

name: Lasan Warbreaker
effect:
Dwarf Warlord
Your Dwarves have the ability "React: After this character is targeted by a melee or ranged strike, spend target Dwarf within one rank: Gain a bonus to AC for the strike equal to the targets ATK. If the strike misses perform a melee strike."

name: Leigh
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Druid
React: Before Leigh dies: Target a character within one rank who must succeed with a Magic save (DC 16) or move backwards one rank.
"Why call Kun Vian, the 'Lady of Mercy'?" Leigh grinned. "That's what her enemies shout when they see her coming."

name: Liam Rowan
effect:
Elf • Ranger
Spend Order: Perform a +2 ranged strike with a bonus to the roll equal to the number of charges on Liam.
React: After a character enters play from the discard pile: Put a charge token on Liam.

name: Light
effect:
Mercenary • Seer
Spend Order: Target an opposing
Warlord: The next die roll the target's controller makes this turn is a Critical Success. Your next die roll is Critical Success.
"The prophecy lives on."

name: Light Hammer
effect:
Weapon
If this character has 3 or greater Hit Points, Light Hammer loses the
Weapon trait.
"I crawled to the surface to share the tale. The destiny of our race and the true name of our land: Worldfall." - Duncan Kinslayer

name: Llyr Militia
effect:
Free Kingdoms
Spend React: Before Llyr Militia dies, shuffle him into your deck: Search your deck for a level 1 non-Llyr Militia Free Kingdoms, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand.

name: Lock in Death
effect: React: Before this character dies: Perform a melee strike. After the strike, if the strike hit and this character is a NoThRoG, return this card to your hand.
"Good timing. I only needed one more anyway." - Kang'Xi

name: Lucky Boots
effect: React: After this character rolls a Critical Failure on a melee or ranged strike, discard Lucky Boots: The strike is a Critical Success.
"Bad Spot! Bad! I spent a copper on those!"

name: Malice
effect:
Dwarf • Assassin
React: After Malice hits with a melee strike against a character with lower skill: The strike is a Critical Success.
"Killin' Nothrogs ain't like puttin' down animals. Animals got more sense."

name: Manifested Spirit
effect:
Elf • Undead
Manifested Spirit has +1 ATK for each other
Undead in this rank.
"They abound now - without the rites or sacrificies. What has Rustiq done?!" - Cybille

name: Massive Boulder
effect:
Massive Boulder may only be equipped by a character with 15 or greater ATK.
Spend Order: Choose an opposing player and discard Massive Boulder: That player inflicts one wound each on two different characters in his army.
"Move those rocks. We're not dead yet." - Uthanak

name: Mercy's Crown
effect:
Helm
This character and your Free Kingdoms characters ignore Critical Failures.
"Keep calling it that. Maybe she'll smile." - Brother Averill

name: Move as One - Verified (Errated)
effect: React: Before another character in this army performs an Order: Until the end of turn, this rogue gains the ability "React: After another character in your army performs an Order: This character performs an Order."
"I got a better offer, 'my lord.' So sorry." - Caibre Netheryn

name: Mudan
effect:
NoThRoG • Assassin
Mudan has +4 ATK while targeting spent characters with melee strikes. Mudan's melee and ranged strikes are a Critical Success on a die roll of 16 or greater.

name: Murder Fate
effect: React: After this character performs a melee strike that hit the target: Inflict a wound on the target. Choose an opposing player who draws a card.
"The spirits take hold. Accept their blessings." - Hrunting

name: Nature's Cowl
effect:
+2 Skill
Order: Spend Nature's Cowl and target an opposing character within 3 ranks: The target must succeed with a Magic save (DC18) or permanently lose 2 Skill and this character permanently gains +2 Skill.
Order: Discard a card: Return Nature's Cowl to your hand from play.

name: Nestor Price
effect:
Mercenary
When Nestor comes into play choose either cleric or wizard. Nestor gains the chosen class.
React: After Nestor casts a spell: Nestor's next die roll this turn is a Critical Success.
"Got some friends you should meet, Varson. Won't také long…"

name: Noble Steed
effect:
Steed
Deverenians with Noble Steed equipped have
Riding +4.
Free Kingdoms with Noble Steed equipped have
Riposte +4.
Order: Spend Noble Steed: Move forward one rank. Opposing characters may not react to or during this action.

name: Offhand Dagger
effect:
Shield
React: After a target character within 1 rank rolls a Critical Failure, spend Offhand Dagger: Perform a melee strike targeting that character.
"Allow me to retort, Tom." - Trevaine Cartwright

name: Omil
effect:
NoThRoG • Seer
Spend Order: Choose an opposing player: That player's next melee or ranged strike is a Critical Failure, or your next melee or ranged strike is a Critical Success, the chosen player decides.
"Scarab was her, Norn. We're close."

name: Peyton Latham
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Scout • Marksmanship +2 • Powerattack +2
Peyton has a bonus to his ATK equal to his Powerattack, and a bonus to his ranged strikes equal to his Marksmanship.
Order: Once per turn, perform a +0 ranged strike that may target an additional rank away.

name: Pride
effect:
Dwarf • Assassin • Unique
React: Once per turn, after Pride performs a melee strike against a spent character that was a Critical Success, discard a card: Kill the target of the strike.
"Hitting someone is easy. It's what you hit inside them that matters."

name: Prolong the Fight
effect: Dwarves do not spend to perform this action.Spend Order: Target a character you control of equal or lower level, choose an opponent who targets a character they control with a level equal or lower than your character: Ready both targets.

name: Put Down
effect: React: After a character within one rank rolls a Critical Failure: Perform a +3 ranged strike targeting that character.
"Given how your queen treats failures, consider this a favor." - Farrel Wadreth

name: Rally to the Cause
effect:
Free Kingdoms play this as a level 1 action.
React: Before a character performs an attack: Each strike from the attack must target this character, if possible, and this character gains +4 AC and +2 Hit Points for the duration of the attack.

name: Rellion's Scepter
effect:
Defend +6
This character may use the Defend feat an additional time per turn.
React: Once per turn, after a melee strike is redirected to this character: Perform a +0 melee strike (+5 for Deverenians) against the attacking character.

name: Ride the Lightning
effect: React: After a character in your army rolls a Critical Success: Move a character in your army forward or backward one rank.
"All things are possible in the Storm, an thou knowest the way." - Kassia the Saint

name: Rise to Power
effect: React: Before this character performs a melee strike: Until end of turn, after this fighter performs a melee strike that hit, the target of the strike must succeed with a Fear Save (DC 12 + this fighter's Skill) or move back a rank and spend.
"You thought us few, Rowan? We are legion!" - Jorn of the Summit

name: Roc Fletching
effect:
Free Kingdoms, Elves, and Mercenaries with Roc Fletching equipped add +2 to their ranged strike rolls.
React: After this rogue makes a ranged strike roll, spend Roc Fletching: Add +3 to the roll.
The elf ducked, but Hawthorne's arrow followed anyway.

name: Rosalie
effect:
Free Kingdoms
Order: Once per turn, target a Free Kingdoms in your army of equal or lower level: The target has an additional melee strike when he attacks, until the end of turn.
"The tide turns, still no Free King. The alliance can wait no longer."

name: Sandals of Fortune
effect: React: After an opposing character rolls a natural 19 or Critical Success in a melee strike or ranged strike targeting this character, discard the Sandals of Fortune: The strike is a Critical Failure.
"But Mingan, they bring out your eyes so." - Tavis Jape

name: Seize Life
effect: Spend Order: Before a character suffers wounds, target a number of characters up to this cleric's level: Reduce the wounds by one and each target has +1 Hit Point until end of turn.
"Our people are divided at our very core, our past as uncertain as our future. For all things, a price..." - The Stone Spider

name: Shadow
effect:
Mercenary • Seer
Spend Order: Target an opposing
Warlord: The next die roll the target's controller makes this turn is a Critical Failre. Your next die roll is Critical Failure.
"Your father is dead Varson."

name: Shield of Waves
effect:
Shield
If this rogue has +8 or greater ATK, Shield of Waves loses the
Shield trait.
"ShiLara sold it for seventy-six silvers by Celinar's stormy shores." - Jarga Reach

name: Simon Abraxas
effect:
Mercenary Warlord • Seer
Order: Once per turn: All players discard their hands and then draw that many cards.
"You demons thought us your lackeys, but now we know another way to harvest your power."

name: Sir Gautier
effect:
Deverenian
While Gautier's AC is 19 or greater, he has +3 ATK, +1 Level and
Riding +5.
"Milord, dire portents in the east: the Storm hath come to Luthlarius."

name: Sir James Reed
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Paladin • Riposte +4
Melee and ranged strikes targeting, and targeted by, Sir James are Critical Failures on a natural roll of 10 or less. Sir James' melee strikes that hit are considered a Critical Success.

name: Skyborne Tome
effect: Order: Once per turn, if this wizard has a +5 or greater bonus to their printed Skill: The next spell this character casts does not require spending as a cost. If this character is a Deverenian, he may perform another Order after this one.
"Flamma cum me ambulant..." - Kassia the Saint

name: Spencer Latham
effect: Free Kingdoms • Llyr
"This is what happens when we put our faith in Toris Kelt fops. 'Free King'? Might as well hunt the Quest Beast."

name: Spot
effect:
Mercenary
Spot's melee strikes ignore AC bonuses.
"…where'd you get that bone, boy?!" - Bradley

name: Squire Kent
effect:
Deverenian • Defend +6
React: Once per turn, after a melee or ranged strike is redirected to Kent: The strike is a Critical Failure.
"An he beareth armor that shattereth blades or shield that turneth bludgeons, any man is feeble that he hath a heart." - Lady Thalia

name: Stab
effect: Order: Perform a melee strike that may only target a stunned character (spent character, if this character is an Elf), and inflict an additional wound if it hits. If this character is a Mercenary, the strike is a Critical Success.
"If you quit squirming, it'll hurt less."

name: Steal Fate
effect: React: After an opposing player plays an action card: Cancel the action. Choose an opposing player who draws a number of cards equal to the action's level.
"No cheating, Keziah." - Dusan Drake

name: Strain the Shot
effect: React: Before this character performs a ranged strike: The strike inflicts an additional wound if it hits. This character suffers a wound after the strike.
"Don't be afraid to pull the string 'til it hurts. If they survive, odds are you won't." - Kapix

name: Sucker Punch
effect: React: Before this character performs a melee strike: After the strike, if the strike hits, spend the target if this character is a Deverenian; inflict a wound on the target if this character is a NoThRoG, perform a +2 melee strike if this character is Free Kingdoms.

name: Suffer
effect: Spend Order: Target a character within two ranks who must succeed with a Magic save (DC 15) or suffer a wound. If the target fails and has an item equpped, return Suffer to your hand.
Impossibly, the fallen wizard stood again, leveling his blood gaze at Cador. "Suffer."

name: Sulack Bloodgullet
effect:
NoThRoG Warlord
All
Warlords have the ability "React: After you roll Initiative: Discard any number of cards."
Spend Order: Choose an opposing player: Perform a number of melee strikes equal to the number of cards in that player's hand.
"We have our orders. Hold Phrygai."

name: Tarya
effect:
NoThRoG
Order: Once per turn, choose an opposing player. Perform a +6 ranged strike or gain +1 Level permanently, the chosen player decides.
"Mmm, yessss... Hyena delights in your fear…"

name: Tempest Corona
effect:
Familiar • Unique
Deverenian only.
React: After one of your Deverenians dies: Put 1 charge token on Tempest Corona.
React: After one of your Deverenians is targeted by a melee strike or action, remove 2 charge token: Redirect the strike or action to an adjacent character.

name: Tempt the Wind
effect: Spend Order: Target a character within three ranks, and an item equipped to that character. The character must either discard the item, or succeed with a Magic save (DC 12 + caster's Skill) or become stunned. Skill bonuses from the target's items are ignored for the save.

name: The Lady of Mercy
effect:
Free Kingdoms Warlord • Cantor • Charisma +4
The Lady of Mercy is a Cleric and a Rogue.
Your Free Kingdoms Critically Succeed on a natural die roll of 17 or greater.
React: After a character rolls a Critical Success on a melee strike: Stun the target of the strike.

name: The Storm
effect:
Unique • 1 Charge
At the beginning of each turn, put a charge token on The Storm.
Spend Order: Discard The Storm, this character suffers a wound: Kill all non-Warlord characters in play with level equal to half the number of charge tokens on The Storm (rounded down).

name: Toadwort
effect:
Familiar • Unique
NoThRoG only.
React: After this character performs a melee strike that killed a character, spend Toadwort: Perform a melee strike using the same die roll against an adjacent character, who gains a bonus to AC equal to the first target's AC for the strike.

name: Token of Favor
effect:
Deverenians, Dwarves and Nothrogs with Token of Favor equipped have +3 ATK.
React: After this fighter makes a melee strike roll, spend Token of Favor: Add +5 to the die roll.
"What game doth Dashkova play now?" - Lord Gahid Rellion

name: Turn Flesh to Bone
effect:
Spend Order: Place this card in your first rank as a level 1
Undead Skeleton with +3 ATK, 10 AC, +0 Skill, 1 Hit Point, and the ability "React: Before this character dies: Return an Elf card from your discard pile to your hand."
"Ichaerus desired a place in our kingdom, and so he shall have it." - Tepheroth

name: Urnack
effect:
NoThRoG
Spend React: After a NoThRoG enters this rank: That NoThRoG performs an attack (spending as normal).
Krun nodded to Urnak, and both charged into the alley.

name: Uther's Shroud
effect:
Cursed • Powerattack +4
This character is a
Barbarian. NoThRoG with Uther's Shroud equipped may use the Powerattack feat an additional time each turn.
React: Before making a Powerattack check, wound this character: The check is a Critical Success.

name: Vad the Cudgel
effect:
Dwarf • Powerattack +6
Order: Once per turn: Succeed with a Powerattack check (DC 20) to gain +5 ATK until end of turn.

name: Verusk
effect:
NoThRoG
React: Once per turn, after Verusk hits with a melee strike, or a NoThRoG rolls a Critical Success on a melee strike: Perform two +8 melee strikes that inflict an additional wound.
"Hmph! Wastin' time in Phrygai. When're we gonna get back ta fightin'?"

name: Vex Duntan
effect:
Dwarf • Powerattack +4
While Vex has 1 or more wounds he has a bonus to his ATK equal to his Skill.
...and knocking each wave of Abyssals down...

name: Visant Glyn
effect:
Elf
React: Once per turn, before an Elf performs a ranged strike: The strike has +2 to the roll.
"It's no mean trick, making the arrow lust for blood, but it helps to give it just the slightest taste first…"

name: Volda's Mantle
effect:
Armor
Order: Spend Volda's Mantle: Target character must succeed with a Magic save (DC10 + this cleric's Skill) or be stunned.
Order: Suffer a wound: Return Volda's Mantle to your hand from play.
"I'll rest. Someday."

name: Wild Mammoth
effect:
Steed
Order: Twice per turn: Move forward or backwards one rank.
Spend Order: Return Wild Mammoth to your hand from play.
"Shh. They don't like riders, so don't let on that we're here." - Ricart Darpor

name: Zel Freed
effect:
Dwarf
Order: Once per turn: Gain a bonus to ATK equal to an adjacent character's Skill, until the end of turn.

name: Zephyr Armor
effect:
Armor
+1 Hit Point.
If this character has +10 or greater Skill, Zephyr Armor loses the
Armor trait.
